item.title: Geohash Size Variation by Latitude
item.description: I am a huge fan of geohashes. I think they are a very elegant and quick solution for many problems.

item.title: Starting a Blog
item.description: I have been meaning to set up a blog and redesign my website for quite some time and I have finally gotten around to doing it.
